Title.description: The Remind about the lesson switch (24.7) does not turn on / off notifications on its own, but transfers to the settings section of the phone's OS application

bug_report.Steps: Tap on the switch Remind about the lesson (24.7)

Expected_Result.Result_2: Switch Remind about the lesson (24.7) optional
Expected_Result.Result_2.1: disabled - the background color of the switch is white
Expected_Result.Result_2.2: enabled - the background color of the switch is green
Expected_Result.Result_3: Reminders for (application name) are turned off / on without going to the device's system settings

bug_report.Actual_Result: Goes to the application settings in the operating system
